strapiPost.title: Rogers Tech Company Acquired by The Stable
strapiPost.content:
Rich Context, a local retail tech company located in Rogers is acquired by The Stable, a consumer brand agency in Minneapolis

  • Info - Rich Context founded in 2016 is a company that focuses on driving customers to buy items online. They currently serve over 200 customers including Nestle, General Mills, and Johnson & Johnson
  • Deep Dive - More information can be found HERE
